H0.text: Which famous book features the character of Bob Cratchit. Oliver Twist

H1.text: Which famous book features the character of Bob Cratchit. David Copperfield

H2.text: Which famous book features the character of Bob Cratchit. Great Expectations

H3.text: Which famous book features the character of Bob Cratchit. Fezziwigs

A4.text: Robert 'Bob' Cratchit is a fictional character in the Charles Dickens 1843 novel A Christmas Carol.

A5.text: Cratchit's son, Tiny Tim, is also a defining character in the novel.

A6.text: The character of Bob Cratchit has been featured in works based on A Christmas Carol.
